EmailTemplate.name: Intern separation notification - intern
EmailTemplate.subject: You separated from {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c}. Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You separated from {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} as your sponsor on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
You can no longer gain experience hours under the supervision of this sponsor.
Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is inactive.
You must get another sponsor to activate your license and gain experience hours.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI021
